member.name: AASHELLMENUITEM
member.summary: Contains information about a menu item.

member.name: AASHELLMENUITEM.lpReserved1
member.summary: Reserved. Applications should ignore this value.

member.name: AASHELLMENUITEM.iReserved
member.summary: Reserved. Applications should ignore this value.

member.name: AASHELLMENUITEM.uiReserved
member.summary: Reserved. Applications should ignore this value.

member.name: AASHELLMENUITEM.lpName
member.summary: If the selected menu item represents a file, this member is a pointer to an structure that contains the name of the file. Otherwise this member is NULL.

member.name: AASHELLMENUITEM.psz
member.summary: A pointer to the string that contains the text to use if there is no file.
